node.title: New Zealand advances to T20 World Cup semi-finals at expense of India
node.alt: Three cricket players in black have a discussion in the middle of a cricket field in a night game
node.description: Captain Kane Williamson guides New Zealand to an eight-wicket victory at the Zayed Cricket Stadium in Abu Dhabi in a result that eliminates India ahead of its match against Namibia on Monday.
node.content: ["New Zealand has become the fourth and final team to qualify for the semi-finals of the\u00a0men's T20 World Cup after a\u00a0comprehensive eight-wicket victory against Afghanistan in its final Group II match on Sunday.", "Najibullah Zadran smashed a career-best 73 to rescue Afghanistan from a top-order collapse as New Zealand's fast bowlers struck early\u00a0at the Zayed Cricket Stadium in Abu Dhabi.", "Afghanistan was 3-19 in the sixth over before\u00a0Najibullah struck three sixes and six fours in his 48-ball innings to take his team to 8-124.", "With captain Kane Williamson scoring a controlled 40 not out in 42 balls, New Zealand romped home in 18.1 overs.", "Wicketkeeper Devon Conway shared an unbroken 68-run partnership with Williamson for the third wicket, scoring 36 not out from 32 balls.", "Star spinner Rashid Khan was the pick of the Afghanistan bowlers with 1-27 from his four overs.\u00a0", "The Black Caps became the second team from Group II, behind Pakistan, to make the semis.", "The result\u00a0eliminates India, which\u00a0finishes its group campaign against Namibia on Monday.", "England and Australia had earlier made the last four from Group I.\u00a0", "Reuters/ABC"]
